attributes.action: Stop shutting our country down and destroying lives and our economy for covid
attributes.additional_details: We've already lost so much and we cannot hide away in our homes for eternity,  there will be no permanent solution just like with colds and flus so the time for change is now. Give us back our freedom and our love of life.
attributes.background:
Enough is enough.
The time to enjoy life again needs to begin and to stop taking away everything important to us. Covid is in the world now and is less deadly then the flu, but we never closed our lives for that. No more masks, no more isolation and no more stopping our children's education.

rejection.details:
You may like to sign the below petition which is currently open on this topic:

Remove all covid-19 restrictions on July 19th 2021
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/589632
